meaningMnemonic: When you <kanji>board</kanji> a plane or a car to take a <kanji>ride</kanji> it's called <vocabulary>boarding</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>embarkation</vocabulary>. You have to get on the right way or you can't ride.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should know those readings for both of these kanji by now, so you should be good to go.
